The prompt below is a question to answer, a task to complete, or a conversation to respond to; decide which and write an appropriate response.
### Prompt:
{{.Input}}
### Response:

mqtt:
  host: emqx.home.svc.cluster.local
  username: "${DT_MQTT_USERNAME}"
  password: "${DT_MQTT_PASSWORD}"

frigate:
  url: http://frigate.home.svc.cluster.local:5000
  cameras:
    - amcrest-frontyard
    - amcrest-pool
    - amcrest-turret
    - amcrest-office

  zones:
    - camera: amcrest-frontyard
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-pool
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-turret
      zone: familyroom
    - camera: amcrest-office
      zone: office

  events:

detect:
  match:
    save: true
  unknown:
    save: true

detectors:
  deepstack:
    enabled: true
    url: "http://deepstack.home.svc.cluster.local:5000"
  compreface:
    enabled: false

time:
  timezone: America/New_York

notify:

#!/bin/sh

npm install homebridge-myq
npm install homebridge-nest
npm install homebridge-platform-orbit

mkdir -p /data/serverfiles/insurgency/cfg && cp /insserver.cfg /data/serverfiles/insurgency/cfg/insserver.cfg && cp /motd.txt /data/serverfiles/insurgency/motd.txt && chown -R 1000:1000 /data && echo "Setup complete"
